title: A Comprehensive Survey of Modern Neural Network Architectures
description: This paper provides a comprehensive survey of modern neural network architectures, including transformers, CNNs, and RNNs, with a focus on their applications in natural language processing and computer vision.

title: Attention Mechanisms in Deep Learning: A Survey
description: We explore various attention mechanisms in deep learning, their mathematical foundations, and their applications in different domains.

title: Self-Supervised Learning: The Dark Matter of Intelligence
description: This paper discusses the importance of self-supervised learning in the quest for more general artificial intelligence systems.
